game.name: Life of Delivery
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 오픈 월드 배달 시뮬레이터. 주문을 전달하고 차량을 업그레이드하며 일상의 랜덤 이벤트를 경험하세요. 사람들을 만나고 도우며 예상치 못한 대화를 즐기세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Open-world delivery simulator where you bring orders to customers, upgrade vehicles, and encounter slice-of-life events. Meet people, help them, and enjoy unexpected conversations and opportunities on your journey.
